verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are [the records of] the generations<WH8435> of Aaron<WH175> and Moses<WH4872> at the time<WH3117> when the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> with Moses<WH4872> on Mount<WH2022> Sinai.<WH5514>
These<WH428> then are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron:<WH175> Nadab<WH5070> the first-born, and Abihu,<WH30> Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar.<WH385>
These<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> the anointed<WH4886> priests,<WH3548> whom<WH834> he ordained<WH4390> <WH3027> to serve<WH3547> as priests.<WH3547>

But Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu<WH30> died<WH4191> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> when they offered<WH7126> strange<WH2114> fire<WH784> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai;<WH5514> and they had<WH1961> no<WH3808> children.<WH1121> So Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar<WH385> served<WH3547> as priests<WH3547> in the lifetime<WH6440> of their father Aaron.<WH1>
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Bring<WH7126> the tribe<WH4294> of Levi<WH3878> near<WH7126> and set<WH5975> them before<WH6440> Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> that they may serve<WH8334> him.

"And they shall perform<WH8104> the duties<WH4931> for him and for the whole<WH3605> congregation<WH5712> before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

"They shall also keep<WH8104> all<WH3605> the furnishings<WH3627> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> along with the duties<WH4931> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>
"You shall thus give<WH5414> the Levites<WH3881> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons;<WH1121> they are wholly<WH5414> given<WH5414> to him from among the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

"So you shall appoint<WH6485> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> that they may keep<WH8104> their priesthood,<WH3550> but the layman<WH2114> who comes<WH7131> near<WH7131> shall be put<WH4191> to death.<WH4191>"
Again the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Now, behold,<WH2009> I have taken<WH3947> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH8432> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> instead<WH8478> of every<WH3605> first-born<WH6363>, the first issue<WH6363> of the womb among<WH4480> the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> So the Levites<WH3881> shall be Mine.

"For all<WH3605> the first-born are Mine; on the day<WH3117> that I struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> all<WH3605> the first-born in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> I sanctified<WH6942> to Myself all<WH3605> the first-born in Israel,<WH3478> from man<WH120> to beast.<WH929> They shall be Mine; I am the Lord.<WH3068>"
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> saying,<WH559>

"Number<WH6485> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> by their families;<WH4940> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605> you shall number.<WH6485>"
So Moses<WH4872> numbered<WH6485> them according<WH5921> to the word<WH6310> of the Lord,<WH3068> just<WH9201> as he had been commanded.<WH6680>
These<WH428> then are the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> by their names:<WH8034> Gershon<WH1648> and Kohath<WH6955> and Merari.<WH4847>
And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> by their families:<WH4940> Libni<WH3845> and Shimei;<WH8096>
and the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> by their families:<WH4940> Amram<WH6019> and Izhar,<WH3324> Hebron<WH9116> and Uzziel;<WH5816>

and the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> by their families:<WH4940> Mahli<WH4249> and Mushi.<WH4187> These<WH428> are the families<WH4940> of the Levites<WH3881> according to their fathers' households.<WH1004>
Of Gershon<WH1648> [was] the family<WH4940> of the Libnites<WH3846> and the family<WH4940> of the Shimeites;<WH8097> these<WH428> [were] the families<WH4940> of the Gershonites.<WH1649>
Their numbered<WH6485> men, in the numbering<WH4557> of every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> [even] their numbered<WH6485> men [were] 7500.
The families<WH4940> of the Gershonites<WH1649> were to camp<WH2583> behind<WH310> the tabernacle<WH4908> westward,<WH3220>
and the leader<WH5387> of the fathers' households<WH1004> of the Gershonites<WH1649> [was] Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Lael.<WH3815>

Now the duties<WH4931> of the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> [involved] the tabernacle<WH4908> and the tent,<WH168> its covering,<WH4372> and the screen<WH4539> for the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150>

and the hangings<WH7050> of the court,<WH2691> and the screen<WH4539> for the doorway<WH6607> of the court,<WH2691> which<WH834> is around<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH4908> and the altar,<WH4196> and its cords,<WH4340> according to all<WH3605> the service<WH5656> concerning them.

And of Kohath<WH6955> [was] the family<WH4940> of the Amramites<WH6020> and the family<WH4940> of the Izharites<WH3325> and the family<WH4940> of the Hebronites<WH2276> and the family<WH4940> of the Uzzielites;<WH5817> these<WH428> were the families<WH4940> of the Kohathites.<WH6956>
In the numbering<WH4557> of every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> [there were] 8600, performing<WH8104> the duties<WH4931> of the sanctuary.<WH6944>
The families<WH4940> of the sons<WH1121> of Kohath<WH6955> were to camp<WH2583> on the southward<WH8486> side<WH3409> of the tabernacle,<WH4908>
and the leader<WH5387> of the fathers' households<WH1004> of the Kohathite<WH6956> families<WH4940> was Elizaphan<WH469> the son<WH1121> of Uzziel.<WH5816>

Now their duties<WH4931> [involved] the ark,<WH727> the table,<WH7979> the lampstand,<WH4501> the altars,<WH4196> and the utensils<WH3627> of the sanctuary<WH6944> with which<WH834> they minister,<WH8334> and the screen,<WH4539> and all<WH3605> the service<WH5656> concerning them;

and Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> [was] the chief<WH5387> of the leaders<WH5387> of Levi,<WH3878> [and had] the oversight<WH6486> of those who perform<WH8104> the duties<WH4931> of the sanctuary.<WH6944>
Of Merari<WH4847> [was] the family<WH4940> of the Mahlites<WH4250> and the family<WH4940> of the Mushites;<WH4188> these<WH428> [were] the families<WH4940> of Merari.<WH4847>
Their numbered<WH6485> men in the numbering<WH4557> of every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> [were] 6200.

And the leader<WH5387> of the fathers' households<WH1004> of the families<WH4940> of Merari<WH4847> [was] Zuriel<WH6700> the son<WH1121> of Abihail.<WH32> They [were] to camp<WH2583> on the northward<WH6828> side<WH3409> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>

Now the appointed<WH6486> duties<WH4931> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847> [involved] the frames<WH7175> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> its bars,<WH1280> its pillars,<WH5982> its sockets,<WH134> all<WH3605> its equipment,<WH3627> and the service<WH5656> concerning them,
and the pillars<WH5982> around<WH5439> the court<WH2691> with their sockets<WH134> and their pegs<WH3489> and their cords.<WH4340>

Now those who were to camp<WH2583> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH4908> eastward,<WH9506> before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> toward the sunrise,<WH4217> are Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> performing<WH8104> the duties<WH4931> of the sanctuary<WH4720> for the obligation<WH4931> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> but the layman<WH2114> coming<WH7131> near<WH7131> was to be put<WH4191> to death.<WH4191>

All<WH3605> the numbered<WH6485> men of the Levites,<WH3881> whom<WH834> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered<WH6485> at the command<WH6310> of the Lord<WH3068> by their families,<WH4940> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> [were] 22000.

Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Number<WH6485> every<WH3605> first-born male<WH2145> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> and make<WH5375> a list<WH4557> of their names.<WH8034>

"And you shall take<WH3947> the Levites<WH3881> for Me, I am the Lord,<WH3068> instead<WH8478> of all<WH3605> the first-born among the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and the cattle<WH929> of the Levites<WH3881> instead<WH8478> of all<WH3605> the first-born among the cattle<WH929> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>"
So Moses<WH4872> numbered<WH6485> all<WH3605> the first-born among the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> him;
and all<WH3605> the first-born males<WH2145> by the number<WH4557> of names<WH8034> from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> for their numbered<WH6485> men were 22273.
Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Take<WH3947> the Levites<WH3881> instead<WH8478> of all<WH3605> the first-born among the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and the cattle<WH929> of the Levites.<WH3881> And the Levites<WH3881> shall be Mine; I am the Lord.<WH3068>
"And for the ransom<WH6299> of the<WH273> of the first-born of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> who are in excess<WH5736> beyond<WH5921> the Levites,<WH3881>

you shall take<WH3947> five<WH2568> shekels<WH8255> apiece,<WH2568> per head;<WH1538> you shall take<WH3947> [them] in terms of the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary<WH6944> (the shekel<WH8255> is twenty<WH6242> gerahs<WH1626>),
and give<WH5414> the money,<WH3701> the ransom<WH9444> of those who are in excess<WH5736> among them, to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons.<WH1121> "
So Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the ransom<WH9444> money<WH3701> from those who were in excess,<WH5736> beyond<WH5921> those ransomed<WH6299> by the Levites;<WH3881>
from the first-born of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> he took<WH3947> the money<WH3701> in terms of the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> 1365.

Then Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> the ransom<WH6299> money<WH3701> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> at the command<WH6310> of the Lord,<WH3068> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
